U-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:Depth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:FlangeWidth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:WebThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:FlangeThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:FilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:EdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:FlangeSlope -> IfcPlaneAngleMeasure
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
}
```
